description: This setting type contains the list of upload locations for files in a project. Each id in the locations attribute points to an existing StorageLocationSetting. The maximum number of storage locations that can be stored for a project is 10. In order to retrieve the default location (the first one in the list) when uploading a file please refer to the GET /entity/{id}/uploadDestination service

locations.description: List of ids pointing to StorageLocationSetting. Custom storage locations can be created using the POST /storageLocation service. The first one in the list is the default location; The maximum number of storage locations for a project is limited to 10.
